message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $120. I believe it's a fantastic deal, let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the item, but I can only pay up to $90 for it. Looking forward to your response!
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I'm willing to come down a bit, how about $110?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $100 for the product. I hope this is acceptable.
